name: Puzzler World XL
description:
Boasting over 1,800 different puzzles, with favorites like Sudoku, crosswords and unique offerings like Link-A-Pix and Pieceword, puzzle fans are sure to find a wealth of fun in this unprecedented collection. Mind-boggling puzzles include: Crosswords, Wordsearch, Fitword, Pieceword, Backwords, Silhouette, Hide and Seek, Link-A-Pix, Sudoku, Hang-man, Add Up, Colour-In, Chain Letters, Picture Quiz, Jigsaw, Sum Up and Splitwords. Get your puzzle on!

Features

•Over 1,800 Puzzles to solve!
•Achievements and Player Trophies
•"Hint Tokens" to help out with the extra-tricky puzzles.
